mapper.select: select * from performance_detail_cate where performance_detail_cate_idx=#{ performance_detail_cate_idx }
select * from performance_cate where performance_cate_idx=#{ performance_cate_idx }
select * from hall where hall_idx=#{ hall_idx }
select * from seat where performance_idx=#{ performance_idx } order by seat_price
select * from performance order by performance_startday desc
select * from performance where performance_idx=#{ performance_idx }
mapper.insert: insert into performance values(null, #{performance_cate_idx}, #{performance_detail_cate_idx}, #{hall_idx}, #{performance_name}, #{performance_startday}, #{performance_endday}, #{performance_runtime}, #{performance_image}, #{performance_age}, default, default, default, default );
mapper.update: update performance set performance_cate_idx = #{performance_cate_idx}, performance_detail_cate_idx = #{performance_detail_cate_idx}, hall_idx = #{hall_idx}, performance_name = #{performance_name}, performance_startday = #{performance_startday}, performance_endday = #{performance_endday}, performance_runtime = #{performance_runtime}, performance_age = #{performance_age} where performance_idx=#{performance_idx}
update performance set performance_image = #{performance_image} where performance_idx=#{performance_idx}
update seat set seat_grade=#{seat_grade}, seat_price=#{seat_price} where seat_idx=#{seat_idx} and performance_idx=#{performance_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT pfm.* FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY p.performance_idx DESC) AS no, p.* FROM ( SELECT p.performance_cate_idx, p.performance_detail_cate_idx, p.hall_idx, p.performance_name, p.performance_image, s.performance_idx, s.seat_price FROM performance p JOIN seat s ON p.performance_idx = s.performance_idx )p )pfm WHERE no BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select * from performance where performance_name like #{search}
